item.title: Roblox: Blox Fruits Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Blox Fruits Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Blox Fruits
  • How to Play Blox Fruits
  • The Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Blox Fruits

Highlights

  • Roblox players can redeem Blox Fruits codes to get in-game rewards like double XP and free stat resets.
  • New Blox Fruits codes are rare these days, but there are still plenty of working codes available for new players.
  • All of the Blox Fruits codes listed below are checked regularly to make sure that they're still active.

When it comes to Roblox games that were inspired by fan-favorite anime series, they don't come much bigger than Blox Fruits . It regularly has more than three-quarters of a million active players and has racked up more than 33 billion visits since its launch in early 2019. It's a must-play for anyone craving a life of adventure, particularly those who also happen to enjoy games like One Piece ​​​​​​.

Much of the game's success can be attributed to the tireless work of the developers, who are constantly adding innovative new features and mechanics for Roblox players to enjoy. They also release new Blox Fruits codes from time to time, which fans of the game can redeem to receive XP boosts, stat resets, and a bunch of other fantastic in-game goodies.

Updated June 22, 2024, by Tom Bowen: Fans of Blox Fruits codes are in the midst of yet another code drought, with no new codes having been added this month. Thankfully, there are still some working Blox Fruits codes that new and returning players can redeem to get a few free stat resets and double XP boosts. Those who've already done so are advised to bookmark this page and check back here every day, as we're constantly on the lookout for new codes for Blox Fruits and will add any that we find to the list below.

How to Redeem Codes for Blox Fruits

When it comes to redeeming codes for Blox Fruit , there are a few simple steps to follow that will be listed below. If, for some reason, a code does not work, players should be sure to check to see if the code has been entered correctly . If the code still doesn't work, this may mean that it has recently expired or has already been redeemed.

  1. Launch Blox Fruits
  2. Click on the blue and white gift icon on the left side of the screen
  3. Enter a code from our list of active Blox Fruits codes
  4. Press the Redeem! button

How to Play Blox Fruits

First, players must choose either the Marines or Pirates faction. Then, players have to take quests to get XP and Beli, the local currency. For Beli, players can buy swords, guns, Blox Fruits that give skills, and, most importantly, boats. With these boats, players can travel to other islands and find the best vendors and strong bosses. Also, starting from level 20, players can engage in PvP between factions.

The Best Roblox Adventure Games Like Blox Fruits

Playing the same game often can sometimes get a little boring, leaving some players craving something new. For those who find themselves in that position, these popular Roblox games like Blox Fruits should definitely help to scratch that itch:

  • Anime Roulette
  • Your Bizarre Adventure
  • Dragon Adventures
  • A One Piece Game
  • Anime Souls Simulator

FAQ

Q: What is the newest code in Blox Fruits?

The newest Blox Fruits code is ADMINHACKED , which can be redeemed for a free Stat Reset.

item.title: Why a New Mad Max Game May Only Be an Unfortunate Repeat of History
item.description:
Highlights

  • Despite critical acclaim, recent Mad Max movies and games have struggled commercially, failing to meet expectations set by earlier successes.
  • Mad Max: Fury Road was believed to have barely broken even at the box office, and the recently released Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga is underperforming.
  • The last Mad Max game in 2015 was viewed as a disappointment in sales, with Warner Bros. blaming the studio for launching on the same day as a major competitor.

The Mad Max franchise has been around for a very long time, debuting a few years after the first Star Wars , just one year after the first Superman movie, and in the same year as the first Alien . Mad Max made quite the splash when it first hit international theaters, retaining the world record for the most profitable movie ever made right up until The Blair Witch Project 's release 20 years later. But every Mad Max movie hasn't been met with the same level of success.

While the first two Mad Max movies were box office smash-hits, Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome began a downward spiral in the franchise's commercial success. Despite receiving critical acclaim, 2015's Mad Max: Fury Road is widely believed to have barely broken even at the box office and history seems to be repeating itself with the recently released Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga . But it's not only Mad Max movies that have experienced this unfortunate commercial trend.

Mad Max Might Not Be Cut Out for The Big Time

The Last Mad Max Game Didn't Sell Too Well

Releasing the same year as Mad Max: Fury Road , the 2015 Mad Max game was the last time fans were given a gaming adaptation of the franchise. Unfortunately, much like its recent movie counterparts, the 2015 Mad Max game didn't fare too well when it came to sales. Though official numbers have never been released, it's been confirmed that the game was viewed as a disappointment from publisher Warner Bros.'s perspective. In a recent thread on Twitter, Avalanche Studios' former chief Christofer Sundberg stated that Warner Bros. "blamed" the studio for the game's "bad sales," which have often been attributed to the game launching on the same day as Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain .

Mad Max 's critical reception also likely didn't help matters, with reviews at the time giving the game scores of around 7. But despite its critical and commercial reception, 2015's Mad Max has become a bit of a cult hit over the last nine years, with many fans enjoying the portrayal of its titular character, its wasteland setting, and its intriguing emphasis on vehicular combat. With there being so few Mad Max video game adaptations, there's a growing desire from fans to see another one, but that might not be the smartest choice for publishers.

A New Mad Max Game Would Probably Meet The Same Fate

Furiosa: A Mad Max Saga is not performing very well at the box office. In its opening weekend, Furiosa managed to make just $25.6 million at the domestic box office, which marked the lowest performance of any Memorial Day debut since 1995. And rather disappointingly, things haven't gotten much better for the long-awaited prequel. At this time, Furiosa has grossed around $160 million at the worldwide box office, which doesn't even recoup the movie's reported $168 million budget.

Despite earning some impressive critical scores across the board, Furiosa has underperformed drastically at the box office, more so than any Mad Max entry before it. Though the franchise definitely has its vocal supporters, it seems as though the Mad Max brand just doesn't hold as much weight as it once did, and unfortunately, those fans alone won't be enough to justify another fully-fledged Mad Max video game adaptation.

item.title: Roblox: Arm Wrestle Simulator Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Arm Wrestle Simulator Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Arm Wrestle Simulator
  • How to Get More Arm Wrestling Simulator Codes
  • The Best Roblox Simulator Games Like Arm Wrestle Simulator

Simulator games have always been popular with Roblox players, but few have proven to be quite as popular as Arm Wrestle Simulator . Since its release in early 2023, the game has been played by millions of people and still boasts an impressively large player base even to this day.

A big part of the game's success is down to its simplicity, with players provided with goals that are as easy to understand as they are to accomplish. Now, Roblox players can make increasing their Bicep Power, Hand Strength, and Cardio Ability even easier with the help of these Arm Wrestle Simulator Codes.

Updated June 22, 2024, by Tom Bowen: New Arm Wrestle Simulator codes have been arriving thick and fast lately; much to the delight of the game's dedicated fans. Together with the positive reaction to some of the more recent updates, this strategy seems to be paying off for the team at Kubo Games, who have seen a fairly healthy increase in the number of active players recently. Whether you're one of those new players or an AWS veteran, it's a good idea to bookmark this page and check back here often, as new Arm Wrestle Simulator codes will be added to the table below whenever we find them.

How to Redeem Codes in Arm Wrestle Simulator

Redeeming codes in Arm WrestleSimulator is the simplest task, even easier than in many other Roblox games. Anyone can deal with it without much difficulty and additional knowledge. However, if users are still having problems, then below are step-by-step instructions on how to claim them:

  • First, launch Arm Wrestle Simulator .
  • After the player has entered the game, one must find and tap on the icon labeled Codes, which is located in the middle right.
  • Then enter the above code in the Enter Code field.
  • Tap on the Verify button.
  • After that, the code will be redeemed, and the player will receive their desired reward.

How to Get More Arm Wrestling Simulator Codes

To get more codes, players can follow the developers' Twitter account. In addition to codes, users will also find news about game updates, which can be quite interesting for fans. Another way to get new codes is to subscribe to the developers’ Discord server. Fans can also save this article and have constant access to all of the latest Arm Wrestling Simulator codes.

The Best Roblox Simulator Games Like Arm Wrestle Simulator

The newest Arm Wrestle Simulator code is atlantis , which can be redeemed for eight hours of triple stat boost.

item.title: The Sims 4 Gets New Free Item for Pride Month
item.description:
Highlights

  • The Sims 4 has a history of inclusivity, offering gender-inclusive character creation and romance options.
  • Join in on the Pride Month celebration in The Sims 4 with free items like the high-neck tight top and more.

Thanks to the custom content creators of The Sims 4 , a new Pride-themed cosmetic item has been added to the game for players wanting to show their unique fashion taste in June. Although The Sims 4 didn't release any specific updates or events for Pride Month, its fans created new content to represent the LGBTQ+ community.

The Sims franchise was among the first life simulators to adopt a gender-inclusive character creation model and has been one of the best games with inclusive romance options since its launch. Because of this, The Sims 4 , one of the most popular entries in the franchise, garners attention each Pride Month as players look forward to potential gifts, goodies, or freebies to celebrate Pride. And thanks to fans and community content creators, June always many lovely items for players to express their identity.

A high-neck tight top in rainbow color variants was added to The Sims 4 as part of a Pride Month package on The Sims Resource. Created by ZNSims, a dedicated Sims creator, this Pride-themed Custom Content can be downloaded using the code “ 1705201 .” The top isn't the only free cosmetic item available. The Pride Month collection also includes a fan-favorite Lace-Up Vest with the pride flag and the Retro Fluffy Curly Hair with LGBTQ+ dye options. All these items are free and could be considered some of the best Custom Content in The Sims 4 compared with other Pride-themed options.

The Sims 4 Code for Pride Top

  • Pride Top Code : 1705201

June was filled with wholesome news about major AAA games giving Pride Month-themed gifts and freebies to their players. For example, Call of Duty gifted its fanbase a Pride Month pack with thematic weapon camos. Overwatch 2 also celebrated with a dedicated event, adding LGBTQ+ decorations to the map and introducing new cosmetics. Halo Infinite too offered Pride Month freebies in June, following in the footsteps of Destiny 2 , which previously celebrated this month by giving a free Pride emote to its players.

The Sims 4 is undoubtedly one of the best games to play during Pride Month. Hopefully, more video games will follow the example of The Sims 4 , creating an inclusive environment for all gamers.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail Leak Teases New Apocalyptic Shadow Boss for Version 2.5
item.description:
Highlights

  • Leaks from Honkai: Star Rail are teasing one of the next bosses set to be featured in the Apocalyptic Shadow game mode.
  • The Version 2.5 update will reportedly add Phantylia the Undying to the Apocalyptic Shadow, featuring a powered-up version of the climactic Xianzhou Luofu boss.
  • Phantylia the Undying's addition to Apocalyptic Shadow is expected to come alongside several updates to the Xianzhou Luofu, including new characters and story content.

A new leak from Honkai: Star Rail is teasing the return of a popular boss from the Xianzhou Luofu for Version 2.5's update to the Apocalyptic Shadow game mode. The newest game mode added to the HoYoverse RPG brings a unique challenge to the game, featuring players battling against powered-up versions of classic bosses. The Apocalyptic Shadow's first rotation pits players against multiple playable characters, featuring the boss versions of both Gepard and Argenti as well as in-game boss Cocolia. Now, one of the game mode's next updates is being teased.

Apocalyptic Shadow has already been heavily rumored to see the return of classic bosses from Honkai: Star Rail . While not featured in the game mode's launch update, leaks have teased the appearance of the "Doomsday Beast" boss from the Herta Space Station in the Apocalyptic Shadow. The game mode also grants players a free character as a reward for first-time completion, with clearing Difficult 2 awarding a copy of four-star character Xueyi. Another of Star Rail 's most popular bosses is now being teased for a future update to the Apocalyptic Shadow.

Honkai: Star Rail Leaks New Apocalyptic Shadow Boss

A new update shared by prominent Honkai: Star Rail leaker HomDGCat is teasing a new boss for the Apocalyptic Shadow game mode. According to the leak, Honkai: Star Rail 's "Phantylia the Undying" will make an appearance as a featured boss during the Version 2.5 rotation of Apocalyptic Shadow. Players first fight Phantylia the Undying during the story of the Xianzhou Luofu, serving as the climax of the story for the China-themed world. Players are also able to re-challenge Phantylia as one of the game's "Echo of War" weekly bosses, granting powerful upgrade materials.

Phantylia the Undying's arrival to the Apocalyptic Shadow comes as the next few updates to Honkai: Star Rail are expected to heavily focus around the Xianzhou Luofu. Previous leaks have revealed that HoYoverse has "several patches" worth of Xianzhou-adjacent characters coming following the conclusion of Penacony's story. The developer has already confirmed two new Xianzhou Luofu characters for Version 2.4, including Feixiao and Yunli alongside a new variant of starter character March 7th. Phantylia the Undying is expected to be added to the Apocalyptic Shadow with Version 2.5, currently rumored to launch on September 4.

Honkai: Star Rail 's recent Version 2.3 update brought plenty of exciting new content to the RPG. The patch brought the long-awaited addition of Firefly to the game's roster as its newest five-star character, with Quantum character Jade also releasing later in the update. Version 2.3 also brought two brand-new game modes for players to dive into, with the addition of the Apocalyptic Shadow and the Divergent Universe. With multiple new characters and bosses planned, new adventures in the Xianzhou Luofu look to be on the way soon.
